Header: UNF presidential candidate Sajith Premadasa says that a self-sufficient export economy will be created
Content: United National Front presidential candidate Sajith Premadasa says that a self-sufficient export economy will be created using fish resource and the benefits of that economy will be distributed among everyone in the country by implementing a new fisheries policy in future. Three public meetings took place today in Moratuwa under the patronage of United National Front presidential candidate Sajith Premadasa. They have been organised by State Minister Eran Wickremarathne. The meetings took place at Moratuwella, Moratumulla areas and in front of the Angulana Railway Station. Speaking at the public rally near Angulana Railway Station Minister Sajith Premadasa said that he would take steps to make the fisheries community stronger economically and socially.
